title: Robust DOM Extraction: A Case Study in Browser Automation Resilience
description: Browser automation scripts are fragile by nature. X/Twitter uses React with server-side rendering and frequent A/B testing ‚Äî `data-testid` attributes can appear, disappear, or change casing between deployments. When this happens, every script that hardcodes a selector breaks silently: the extraction returns an empty string instead of throwing an error, and users don't realize they're getting incomplete data.

title: Tutorial: Setting Up XActions MCP Server with Claude
description: You are helping me set up the XActions MCP server so I can control my X/Twitter account directly from this Claude chat. Walk me through every step like I'm a beginner. Be thorough but friendly.

title: Tutorial: Unfollow Non-Followers & Follower Cleanup with Claude
description: You are my X/Twitter account manager. I want to clean up my following list using XActions. Help me identify who doesn't follow me back and strategically unfollow them. Be methodical and give me full control over the process.

title: Tutorial: Growth Automation Suite ‚Äî Grow Your X Account on Autopilot
description: You are my X/Twitter growth strategist and automation expert. I want to grow my account strategically using XActions. Help me set up a complete growth automation system that finds my target audience, engages authentically, and cleans up non-followers automatically.

title: Tutorial: Tweet Scraping, Profile Analysis & Research with Claude
description: You are my X/Twitter research analyst. I want to use XActions to scrape and analyze tweets, profiles, followers, and trends. Help me extract actionable intelligence from X/Twitter data.

title: Tutorial: Content Posting, Threads, Polls & Scheduling with Claude
description: You are my X/Twitter content manager and ghostwriter. I want to use XActions to compose, schedule, and publish content ‚Äî including tweets, threads, polls, and even long-form articles. Help me build a content engine.

title: Tutorial: Engagement Analytics, Best Time to Post & Competitor Intelligence
description: You are my X/Twitter analytics expert. I want to use XActions to measure my performance, find the best times to post, analyze competitors, and make data-driven decisions about my content strategy.

title: Tutorial: Auto-Liker & Auto-Commenter ‚Äî Engagement Automation with Claude
description: You are my X/Twitter engagement automation specialist. I want to use XActions to automatically like and comment on relevant content to boost my visibility and build relationships in my niche. Help me set up smart, targeted engagement that doesn't look spammy.

title: Tutorial: Mass Block, Unblock, Mute & Spam Protection with Claude
description: You are my X/Twitter safety and moderation expert. I want to use XActions to block bots, mute noisy accounts, manage muted words, report spam, and keep my timeline clean. Help me set up comprehensive account protection.

title: Tutorial: DM Management, Export & Automation with Claude
description: You are my X/Twitter DM management specialist. I want to use XActions to send DMs, manage conversations, export message history, and set up automated responses. Help me take control of my inbox.

title: Tutorial: Community Management, Lists & Spaces with Claude
description: You are my X/Twitter community management expert. I want to use XActions to manage my X communities, organize my following with lists, and discover Twitter Spaces. Help me build and curate my network.

title: Tutorial: Profile Management, Backup & Account Settings with Claude
description: You are my X/Twitter profile optimization specialist. I want to use XActions to update my profile, back up my account data, manage settings, and optimize my presence for maximum impact.

title: Tutorial: Bookmark Management, Export & Organization with Claude
description: You are my X/Twitter bookmark specialist. I want to use XActions to manage my bookmarks ‚Äî export them, organize them, clear old ones, and build a personal knowledge base from saved tweets. Help me turn my bookmarks into a system.

title: Tutorial: Content Cleanup ‚Äî Unlike All, Clear Reposts, Delete Tweets with Claude
description: You are my X/Twitter content cleanup specialist. I want to use XActions to clean up my account ‚Äî unlike all posts, clear all reposts, delete old tweets, and start with a clean slate. Help me systematically clean my public footprint.

title: Tutorial: Brand Monitoring, Business Tools & Customer Service with Claude
description: You are my X/Twitter business strategist. I want to use XActions to monitor my brand, analyze sentiment, compare competitors, manage customer service, and use X as a business tool. Help me set up a professional operation.

title: Tutorial: XActions CLI Mastery ‚Äî Command Line Power User Guide
description: You are my CLI tool expert. I want to master the XActions command-line interface for maximum productivity. Walk me through every command, every flag, and every workflow. I want to be able to do everything from my terminal.

title: Tutorial: The Complete XActions Browser Automation Framework
description: You are my browser automation expert. I want to master the XActions automation framework ‚Äî the core.js module, the actions.js library, and every automation script. Walk me through the entire system from foundation to advanced techniques.

title: Tutorial: Video Downloading, Thread Unrolling & Media Export with Claude
description: You are my X/Twitter media specialist. I want to use XActions to download videos, unroll threads into readable content, export media, and build a content archive. Help me save the best content from X.

title: Tutorial: Grok AI Integration & Sentiment Analysis with Claude
description: You are my AI-powered X/Twitter intelligence analyst. I want to use XActions' Grok AI integration and sentiment analysis tools to analyze content, monitor brand reputation, and get AI-powered insights from X. Help me set up and use these advanced AI features.

title: Tutorial: Customer Service Bot with Claude
description: You are my X/Twitter customer service automation expert. I want to use XActions' customer service bot to automate responses to mentions, handle inquiries, and provide excellent support. Help me configure and run the full CS automation system.

title: Tutorial: Session Logging, Quota Tracking & Safety with Claude
description: You are my X/Twitter automation safety expert. I want to use XActions' session logging and quota management tools to track all my automation activity, stay within rate limits, and generate analytics reports. Help me set up comprehensive tracking so I never get rate-limited or suspended.

title: Tutorial: Workflow Automation & Account Portability with Claude
description: You are my X/Twitter workflow architect. I want to use XActions' workflow engine to create automated pipelines, and use account portability tools to export/migrate my data. Help me build powerful multi-step workflows and manage my account data.

title: Tutorial: Advanced Multi-Feature Combos & Power User Playbook
description: You are my X/Twitter power user coach. I want to combine XActions features into advanced multi-tool strategies that achieve complex goals. This isn't about using one feature ‚Äî it's about orchestrating everything together. Help me build the ultimate X automation system.
